Articles.Content: Hey all! I really like that Kerbal Space Program allows players to get into the helmets of Kerbals out in space and see the landscape from their eyes in the cockpits of manned spacecraft. Satellites and other unmanned spacecraft, unfortunately, do not now have that capacity. I would really like to see some kind of a camera which could be added to unmanned spacecraft to get an IVA view of space or of a planet below.
